channel.title: radio on Truck Stop Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in radio on Truck Stop Coffee
channel.copyright: All work written by Sarah Allen Reed.

item.title: #019: Stuffy Turkeys And Jive Tofurkeys - November 2023 Radio Calendar
item.description: IN A NOT TOO DISTANT HOLIDAY, NEXT THURSDAY AD! Hey y’all! As the vast majority of you know, I’ve been the host of The Jazz Program on datafruits.fm for a good couple years now, and the host of a small show called Talkie Time on the timeslot before it. I’ve decided to make a monthly post here to let you fine folks know which records we’re going to be playing each episode, as well as take a bit to talk about some of my favorite jazz and jazz-related artists and records.

item.title: Photo Roll 11 - Jazzy Fuckin' Holidays 2023 Poster Process
item.description: Part one of a series of progress photo galleries of me working through Our Lady Maven, Issue 2. Drafting, Pencilling, and Inking Starting in on pencils. The lettering and all that was done (as always) on graph paper and glued up as I went; for a more in-depth look at how I do that, check out this process thread. Here's the rest of the lettering, glued up and into place.

item.title: Photo Roll 09 - Scenes From The Studio - Datafruits World Expo Poster
item.description:
Part one of a series of progress photo galleries of me working through Our Lady Maven, Issue 2.
Initial pencils and lettering. Starting in on inking. First and second pass of inks down. I wanna point out here that the lil' guy there in the witch's hand was designed by Datafruits' own Zaxy. His name is Beamsprout, if you were curious.

item.title: #002: Why Love Jazz? About The Jazz Program and Our February 2023 Programming
item.description: You might not like it, but this is what peak UI design looks like. Hey y’all! As the vast majority of you know, I’ve been the host of The Jazz Program on datafruits.fm for a good couple years now, and the host of a small show called Talkie Time on the timeslot before it. Since finally deleting my Twitter account, however, I’ve had a bit of an issue.
